name: Truck driver EXAM
description:
Feel all the hard work of a real American truck driver. Complete all levels, delivering a wide variety of goods around the world from the hot sands of the Sahara to the snowy expanses of Russian Siberia. 

Features of the game: 

- Beautiful and pleasant graphics 

- Realistic tuned car physics

 - Original heavy truck sounds 

- A huge variety of cargo, from pipes to a helicopter

 - The painting of the car has been worked out in detail 

- Both simple colors and unique vinyls will be available for you, from the usual military camouflage to futuristic themes 

- Changing the camera position

 - Very high-quality soundtrack 

Complete levels, unlock exciting new stages, become the number one driver.
